name: Mariana
shortBio:
My name is Mariana Manrique Estrada and I'm a UX/UI designer living in Göteborg, Sweden.

I'm a gal from Mexico that enjoys meeting new people and learning from them. I have a background in industrial design so I like exploring tangible intefaces. My favourite reading genres are sci-fi and fantasy.

name: Frida
shortBio:
My name is Frida Andersson and I'm a UX/UI designer living in Göteborg, Sweden.

I’ve worked and studied in Auckland, New York and Berlin before moving back to my roots on the Swedish west coast. I’m a creative and curious person always up to trying a new craft, most lately ceramics.

name: Sebastian
shortBio:
My name is Sebastian Ekstrand and I'm a UX/UI designer and Front-End developer living in Mölnlycke, Sweden.

I'm a former Long and Triple jumper on a swedish national level and nowadays a very dedicated musician that creates and produces a lot of music on my spare time.

name: Sofia
shortBio:
My name is Sofia Melhus and I'm a UX/UI designer living in Mölndal, Sweden.

Powerlifting has become a big interest the last couple of years and therefore a fair amount of my time is spent at the gym. This complements well with my other big interest of baking bread, pizza and other good stuff that can be enjoyed after some heavy lifting.

name: Sofia
shortBio:
My name is Sofia Ödling and I'm a UX/UI designer that lives on the east side of Gothenburg, close to Skatås forest.

I enjoy being out in the woods and like to try new things, both when it comes to sports or food. I am originally from Norrland and have spent a lot of time up in colder parts of Sweden, therefore snowboarding is also a big interest of mine.

name: Elin
shortBio:
My name is Elin Karlsson and I'm a designer living in Hisingen, Gothenburg, Sweden.

I'm a food lover, nature lover, all-kinds-of-animal-lover. I enjoy creating crafts & arts. Sometimes I'm a floorball player. Always curios!

name: Daniel Shai
shortBio:
Howdy, the names Daniel Shai Gunnarsson, but yall can call me Daniel or Shai or any combination you like. I'm a product designer working out of Linné GBG, dreaming of moving somewhere bigger tho - Not yet decided where.

I love creating and I just signed a contract for a nice lil venue in Sockerbruket in gothenburg - The plan is to have it as a creative hub for creators and artists alike. and I'm a UX/UI designer and Front-End developer living in Mölnlycke, Sweden.

I'm a former Long and Triple jumper on a swedish national level and nowadays a very dedicated musician that creates and produces a lot of music on my spare time.

name: Isabelle
shortBio:
My name is Isabelle Björklund and I'm a UX designer living on Hisingen, Sweden.

I have worked with all kinds of areas, from public transport, irrigation systems, e-com and now car industry. Loves to explore new nature areas, restaurants and activities.
